attributes.action: Remove the option of having a dual nationality passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the holders of all dual-joint UK nationality passport holders be given the option to surrender one of their Dual passports, and for them to be given the choice of which nationality they wish to hold, either UK or that of another nationality. If in the event that the choice is that of another nation, then the individual must be treated as a visitor to the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
